reviews.customers_say: Customers find the cardigan to be a great layering piece with a perfect length that covers below the hips, and appreciate its soft, lightweight fabric.

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Loved it
items.body: Very nice. Perfect for the price Read more
items.author: Lois D

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Great Material, Finally!
items.body: Admittedly, I am particular and I have had difficulty finding a vest that looks nice, fits great, drapes well, and provides just the right amount of warmth without being too heavy. And this vest is perfection! I ordered my normal size and fit is as expected. It is lightweight and very comfortable any season. I purchased for winter because indoors, like at restaurants, I prefer just a little bit of extra warmth without the bulk. Additionally, the black is a true black. It washes well, no fading or pilling. No problem drying on low heat and no shrinkage at all. Plus no ironing required! Yes, this fits the bill and I may have to buy another color. Read more
items.author: Blonde_Boomer

items.title: 4.0 out of 5 stars Lighter & brighter blue than expected
items.body: Review of Large Size: I really like this sleeveless duster. It’s a nice, smooth, lightweight sweater knit & hangs straight, so it’s slimming. It’s not too long like some are. I’m 5’-9”, 165 lbs. I usually need an XL but, since it has an open front, I ordered Large so there’s not too much fabric and I am happy with it. It’s not a dark navy blue, but rather a dark blue, see photo with it against one of my old dark navy dusters. It came folded with creases so I steamed it with a wet handkerchief & iron on the cotton setting. After ironing the front edges still curled inward & the bottom hem laid flat. It doesn’t meet in front on me so if it’s windy or I want to dress it up a bit, I can use either my old circle pin or one of my new sweater clips (see photos). Note: Amazon has many nice “sweater clips” to keep a duster closed if you like that look. I really like the duster & plan to buy more colors. FOLLOW UP REVIEW: I liked this item so much that I ordered the same navy item again but in XLarge so it would a bit bigger. It came today and it fit the same as the Large. So I compared the XLarge & the Large and they are identical in all dimensions. I’m guessing that the XLarge has the wrong size tag. I got a green one, too and it’s a nice color. Read more
items.author: Sue G

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Very versatile piece for fall!
items.body: I love to wear leggings, but don't love the rear view. This long vest is the perfect topper to make leggings and top outfit more demure, and more stylish. The material is a light sweater knit and it hangs beautifully--doesn't cling. I'm going to be using this a lot over the fall and winter and plan to buy at least one more color. I'm 5'9" and 145 lbs. The L fit me just right. Read more
items.author: Karen Stock

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Seasonal, on trend and just generally great.
items.body: Perfect. Length (I’m 5’3”), weight (any season), color (lt gray), washability (great). There are lots of these right now, this is THE ONE. Read more
items.author: Bonnie Canelakes

items.title: 3.0 out of 5 stars It’s long
items.body: It was cute although the material was thin. It’s really long, my fault, I should have read the instructions. I will return it and find another short one. Read more
items.author: alsadie68

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Great buy
items.body: Great size for a medium and feels very soft and comfortable Read more
items.author: Diane Costa

short_description:
Womens Maxi Dress Sleeveless is made for a polished look that still feels comfortable to wear. It is designed to sit cleanly on the body with a flattering shape that works for day plans and dressier moments without feeling overdone.

The fit focuses on balance rather than extremes, so you can move naturally while still getting a defined silhouette. Choose your usual size for a closer look, or size up if you prefer a little more ease through the waist and hips.

Styling is simple: keep accessories minimal for a clean finish, or add a jacket and statement shoes when you want a sharper outfit. This piece photographs well thanks to smooth lines and a structured feel that stays put once you have it adjusted.

With the right fit and simple styling, this item becomes an easy go-to when you want something that looks intentional without requiring extra effort.

This piece transitions well from daytime plans to evening events with a quick change of shoes and a small bag or clutch.

This piece transitions well from daytime plans to evening events with a quick change of shoes and a small bag or clutch.

The fit focuses on balance rather than extremes, so you can move naturally while still getting a defined silhouette. Choose your usual size for a closer look, or size up if you prefer a little more ease through the waist and hips.

Styling is simple: keep accessories minimal for a clean finish, or add a jacket and statement shoes when you want a sharper outfit. This piece photographs well thanks to smooth lines and a structured feel that stays put once you have it adjusted.

long_description:
Womens Maxi Dress Sleeveless is a versatile piece you can reach for when you want a put-together look that still feels comfortable. The goal is simple: a silhouette that reads polished, photographs well, and stays wearable for a full day or a long night.

Fit and sizing Fit is where most outfits win or lose. This design aims for a balanced shape with a defined line through the torso, a clean waist, and a smooth finish through the hips and legs. If you prefer a more relaxed feel, size up; if you like a closer fit, stay true to size. Sizes may include: One Size.

Fabric and comfort Comfort is not just about softness. It is also about movement and how the fabric behaves as you walk, sit, and stand. A fabric blend with a bit of give helps it keep its shape while still feeling wearable.

Highlights A clean neckline and a refined silhouette for an elevated look. Designed to layer easily with jackets, wraps, or sweaters. Works well with both minimal accessories and statement pieces.

How to style Styling ideas: keep it minimal with neutral shoes and one standout accessory. For a relaxed daytime look, add a denim jacket or cardigan. For events, switch to a bolder shoe and a small clutch for a sharper finish.

Color notes Available colors may include: (Pocket)black, (Pocket)khaki, Black, Dark Gray, (Pocket)orange, Navy, Wine Red, Khaki, Pink, Z-black(long Sleeve), Ivory, Light Gray, (Pocket)light Gray, Green. If a shade is sold out, check back as availability can change.

Care Care guidance matters if you want it to keep its shape and finish. Follow the label first.
